vialab.simpleMultiTouch

Class TouchClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.TouchClient

  • public class TouchClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The TUIO Processing client. University of Ontario Institute of Technology. Summer Research Assistant with Dr. Christopher Collins (Summer 2011) collaborating with Dr. Mark Hancock.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik Paluka

      • addZone

        public void addZone(Zone zone)
        Adds a zone to the zone list. When a student creates a zone, they must add it to this list.
        Parameters:
        zone - Zone - The zone to add to the list.

      • removeZone

        Parameters:
        zone - Zone - The zone to remove from the list.

      • applyZonesMatrix

        public void applyZonesMatrix(boolean flag)
        Apply the zone's matrix to the touch input
        Parameters:
        flag - - boolean

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Performs the drawing of the zones in order. Zone on top-most layer gets drawn last. Goes through the list on zones, pushes the current transformation matrix, applies the zone's matrix, draws the zone, pops the matrix, and when at the end of the list, it draws the touch points.

      • getTuioObjects

        public java.util.Vector<TUIO.TuioObject> getTuioObjects()
        Returns a vector containing all the current TuioObjects.
        Returns:
        Vector

      • getTouches

        public static Touch[] getTouches()
        Returns a vector containing all the current Touches(TuioCursors).
        Returns:

      • getTuioObject

        public TUIO.TuioObject getTuioObject(long s_id)
        Returns a the TuioObject associated with the session ID
        Parameters:
        s_id - long - Session ID of the TuioObject
        Returns:
        TuioObject

      • getTouch

        public static Touch getTouch(long s_id)
        Returns the Touch(TuioCursor) associated with the session ID
        Parameters:
        s_id - long - Session ID of the Touch(TuioCursor)
        Returns:
        TuioCursor

      • getTouchCount

        public int getTouchCount()
        Returns the number of current Touches (TuioCursors)
        Returns:
        number of current touches

      • pre

        public void pre()
        Manipulates the zone's position if it is throw-able after it has been released by a finger (cursor) Done before each call to draw. Uses the zone's x and y friction values.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disconnects the TuioClient when the PApplet is stopped. Shuts down any threads, disconnect from the net, unload memory, etc.

      • runWinTouchTuioServer

        public void runWinTouchTuioServer(java.lang.String touch2TuioExePath)
        Runs a server that sends TUIO events using Windows 7 Touch events
        Parameters:
        touch2TuioExePath - String - the full name (including path) of the exe of Touch2Tuio
        See Also:
        Touch2Tuio
